member.name: T:Ranorex.RawText
member.summary: Raw text drawn by the GDI API.

member.name: M:Ranorex.RawText.CaptureString(Ranorex.Core.Element)
member.summary: Tries to capture the raw text string content from the specified element.
member.param: The element to capture the text from. The element must have the nativewindow capability.
member.returns: The captured text string or null if the does not support the nativewindow capability.
member.exception: If is a null reference.
If capturing the raw text fails, e.g. due to security restrictions.
